= KoLAPI =

KoLAPI is a Object Oriented API for automating the gameplay (e.g. building a bot) of the [http://www.kingdomofloathing.com Kingdom of Loathing] game.

The goal of KoLAPI is to provide a flexible interface for writing bots that gives the developer as much control and information as possible while hiding the mundane details from them (e.g. dealing with HTTP, parsing results, etc..).

Support Languages:
  * Perl
